alert.note: Alert for Central Mountains; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 3:14PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Sanpete and north central Sevier Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Salina, or 17 miles northeast of Richfield, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Salina, Aurora, Redmond, Mayfield, Sigurd and Axtell. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 46 and 68. US Route 50 between mile markers 153 and 158. US Route 89 between mile markers 226 and 235. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Mountains; Sanpete Valley; Sevier Valley
